author: Guest (Guest)
title: My 2 cents.
text:
I am getting a BUILD ERROR when I run:
mvn archetype:create -DarchetypeGroupId=net.databinder -DarchetypeArtifactId=data-app -DarchetypeVersion=0.3 -DgroupId=example -DartifactId=myExample

The error says: "Embedded error: Unable to add module to the current project as it is not of packaging type 'pom'"

I tried changing the archetypeVersion to 0.9 but it doesn't seem to work. Any ideas?

Thanks!
